name: Eric Thompson
summary: Eric Thompson. Actor: Dougal and the Blue Cat. Eric Thompson was born on 9 November 1929 in Sleaford, Lincolnshire, England, UK. He was an actor and writer, known for Dougal and the Blue Cat (1970), Serjeant Musgrave's Dance (1965) and One Day in the Life of Ivan Denisovich (1970). He was previously married to Phyllida Law. He died on 30 November 1982 in Camden, London, England, UK.
